class MeldService (View source)

Class MeldService

Methods

array|string
meld(mixed $prefix, mixed $suffix)

Melds the given prefix(es) and suffix(es), and returns the result.

bool
isReturnTypeArray(mixed $prefix, mixed $suffix)

Determines whether either of the given inputs is an array. If so, we should return an array of strings. Otherwise, we should return a string.

array
normalizeMeldParameter(mixed $value)

Normalises the given "prefixes" or "suffixes" parameter, by ensuring that it's an array we can loop through.

string
meldPair(mixed $prefix, mixed $suffix)

Melds the given pair, and returns the result.

string
normalizeMeldPairParameter(mixed $value)

Normalises the given "pair" parameter, to ensure it's a string.
